name: Carsten Eickhoff
content: Health NLP | Carsten people publications teaching openings resources news Carsten Eickhoff Professor, Director Office: Schaffhausenstraße 77, Office 1.35 [email protected] 0000-0001-9895-4061 carsteneickhoff eickhoff I develop data-driven computational methods for improving individual health and quality of medical care. I lead the Health NLP Lab at the University of Tübingen, where we specialize in mining, representation, and retrieval of large-scale natural language resources. I am a member of the Cluster of Excellence "Machine Learning: New Perspectives for Science". Check out their blog here. Metrics Number of publications: 191 Citations: 6,642 (Google Scholar) h-index: 36 i10-index: 98 Cumulative Journal Impact Factor: 415 Academic Career Year Position Affiliation 2022 - now Full Professor, Director University of Tübingen, Germany 2022 -
